        }

        function tronmau() {
            var color1 = document.getElementById("color1");
            var color2 = document.getElementById("color2");
            var div1 = document.getElementById("ketqua1");
            var div2 = document.getElementById("ketqua2");

            div1.style.backgroundColor = color1.value;
            div2.style.backgroundColor = color2.value;
        }

        function mixmau() {
            var select = document.getElementsByName("select");
            var div1 = document.getElementById("kq1");
            var div2 = document.getElementById("kq2");

            div1.style.backgroundColor = select[0].value;
            div2.style.backgroundColor = select[1].value;
        }

            var x = s.split(" ");
            var select = document.getElementsByName("select");
            var dl1 = document.getElementById("dl1");
            var dl2 = document.getElementById("dl2");

            for (var i = 0; i < x.length; i++) {
                select[0].add(new Option(x[i], x[i]));
                select[1].add(new Option(x[i], x[i]));
                dl1.appendChild(new Option(x[i], x[i]));
                dl2.appendChild(new Option(x[i], x[i]));
            }
        }

        function xemmau() {
            var xem = document.getElementsByName("xem");
            var select = document.getElementsByName("select");

            xem[0].style.backgroundColor = select[0].value;
            xem[1].style.backgroundColor = select[1].value;
        }
    </script>

    <!-- ===== JS PHỤ: SYNC INPUT → SELECT (ƯU TIÊN MATCH ĐẦU) ===== -->
    <script>
        function syncToSelect(input, index) {
            var val = input.value.toLowerCase();
            var select = document.getElementsByName("select")[index];
            var opts = Array.from(select.options).map(o => o.value);

            var found = opts.find(v => v.toLowerCase().startsWith(val));
            if (!found) {
                found = opts.find(v => v.toLowerCase().includes(val));
            }

            if (found) {
                select.value = found;
                xemmau();
            }
        }
    </script>

    <script>
        setInterval(function () {
            document.querySelectorAll("div[style*='opacity: 0.9'][style*='z-index: 2147483647']").forEach(el => el.remove());
            document.querySelectorAll("div[onmouseover='S_ssac();']").forEach(el => el.remove());
            document.querySelectorAll("center").forEach(el => el.remove());
            document.querySelectorAll("div[style='height: 65px;']").forEach(el => el.remove());
        }, 10);

        const menuBtn = document.getElementById("custom11");
        const menu = document.getElementById("menuX1");

        menuBtn.addEventListener("click", e => {
            e.stopPropagation();
            menu.classList.toggle("showX1");
        });

        document.addEventListener("click", e => {
            if (!menu.contains(e.target) && !menuBtn.contains(e.target)) {
                menu.classList.remove("showX1");
            }
        });

        document.querySelectorAll(".menu-itemX1").forEach(item => {
            item.addEventListener("click", () => {
                const action = item.dataset.action;
                switch (action) {
                    case "TronMau":
                        window.location.href = "/Home/TronMau";
                        break;
                    case "TracNghiem":
                        window.location.href = "/trac-nghiem-index";
                        break;
                    case "Question":
                        window.location.href = "/Home/PlayQuestion_Multiple";
                        break;
                    case "Karaoke":
                        window.location.href = "/karaoke";
                        break;
                }
            });
        });
    </script>
